text: læa hak mi sxng fay cak brrda phu sraththa thaleaa wiwath kan phwk cea k cng kilkeliy rahwang thang sxng fay hak fay hnung nı sxng fay nan lameid xik fay hnung phwk cea k cng pram fay thi lameid cnkwa fay nan ca klab su phra baycha khx ngxallxhˌ chanan hak fay nan klab (su phra baycha khx ngxallxhˌ)læw phwk cea k cng pranipranxm rahwang thang sxng fay dwy khwam yutithrrm læa phwk cea cng hı khwam theiyngthrrm (kæ thang sxng fay) theid thæ cring xallxhˌ thrng rak khır brrda phu hı khwam theiyngthrrm
